aboutMe.description: A very skilled Software Engineer with a lot of experience in the software industry. I have been developing enterprise software for years, using the latest and most cutting-edge technologies, such as NodeJS, Angular, but also robust frameworks like Laravel (PHP) and profound technologies such as C++. My educational background helps me on a daily basis to solve the most challenging problems and algorithms, as I graduated and received my master’s degree in Computer Science at the Federal University of Rio Grande do Norte.

items.subtitle: Instituto Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia do Rio Grande do Norte
items.title: Técnico em Informática

items.subtitle: Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Norte
items.title: Bacharelado em Ciência da Computação
items.description: I was a member of the Tutorial Education Program for Computer Science Course (PET-CC) and developed teaching, research, and extension activities. I was also a volunteer in a Scientific project to develop a teaching tool based on a game, and it was turned into my end of course paper.

items.subtitle: Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Norte
items.title: Master's Degree in Computer Systems
items.description: Master in Systems and Computing with a focus on experimental algorithms and optimization. I worked on a problem called The Traveling Salesman Problem with Rideshare and Quota, inspired by the well-known Traveling Salesman Problem.

items.title: Android Developer
items.subtitle: Federal University of Rio Grande do Norte Informatics Superintendence (Intership)
items.description: Worked as a mobile developer on the Integrated Academic Activity Management System (aka SIGAA) mobile version.

items.title: Full Stack Developer
items.subtitle: Freelancer
items.description: Developing my skills as a mobile developer. I’ve worked mainly with Android and Windows Phone as freelancer. I’ve also worked with web development designing and developing CMS’s for business.

items.title: Software Engineer
items.subtitle: Synco
items.description: Designed and developed the synco app and backend services. I’ve worked on the very beginning of this project to accomplish the product time to market.

items.title: Software Engineer
items.subtitle: Cloud Plus Plus
items.description: I work as lead developer of the mobile sales CRM. Also work as developer on several Cloud Plus Plus projects, using technologies like Laravel, AngularJs, Angular, Vue.js and Node.js.
